ygData.subject: Re: Castle Mistmoore (was: Trade of the Century..)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Over the last week, 12 nightshade wreaths, 6 EBW, and soulfire hilts for both Pals of the guild. 3 bards of the guild all have the battle drums and the
ygData.messageBody:
>If it was as easy as you say, then there would be a lot
>more Soulfires and EBWs and Nightshade Wreaths floating
>around. People are 'afraid' of the castle and for good
>reason. It's not the picnic people make it out to be.


Over the last week, 12 nightshade wreaths, 6 EBW, and soulfire hilts for
both Pals of the guild. 3 bards of the guild all have the battle drums and
the lute, and a whole schwack of diamondine earrings. Fun place when you
know waht you are doing as I find that is the major killer to parties in
that place. Go with someone who has spent a lot of time there and it all
changes.
As to wolf form, your faction will make you kos even in wolf form over time.
That and the dorky teeth you can see while attacking are irritating =)

Kragan
